name: Luxury Snow Coach & Bus: Hill to City
name_original: Luxury Snow Coach & Bus: Hill to City
description:
You are being assigned to the task to bring passengers safely from their Bus Stop to their destination. In Snow Bus Simulator you take on the role of an real life bus driver working shifts in an offroad snow track.Drive luxurious bus in snowy and city to pick passengers from one station or drop to the other given station in given time. Amazing driving in Amazing Tourist Bus Driver is a wonderful and enjoyable riding simulation. This Amazing Bus Driver simulator gives you a real challenge of dangerous track with risky driving experience.Ride bus gives you an actual trial of challenging track with risky and driving skill. In this tourist bus driver game you have transport the passenger from city place to village. and this is a pure auto bus bus passenger transport and transporter game. enjoy the transporting on this bus transport simulator like a army or military bus transport game.
Carefully ride do not collide any vehicles and hurdles. Do not hit any oncoming traffic so, tight seat belt and drive your speedy bus simulator in a hardly tracks to become a driver. In this enjoyable city tourist bus driving game you will face multiple huge latest model buses, first bus will be unlock and others buses will be locked. Complete mission collect extra points to unlock next wonderful buses and customize your favorite bus.
Are you playing this unique astounding and adventurous exciting ultimate city tourist bus driving simulation? You can also test your thrilling driving abilities and face difficult trials with stunning Graphics and realistic dazzling environment, where you will drive beautiful bus like physical driver and make remarkable internal feeling like a real bus driver by riding furious bus across the great tasks of escapade riding.
Features:
1.Snow blizzards
2. Different busses
3.Simple and adaptable simulator controls
4.Use your driving skills, complete each mission and unlock other levels
5. Enjoyable Sounds Effects
